name: Levitation Simulator
description:
In order to overcome the law of gravity, you, whose mass has become negative due to the force of strong magnetic force, will react seriously and greatly to even a small physical collision.

Hone your levitation skills and succeed in the secret mission of fate.


Levitation Simulator is a game where you can experience levitation.

This game is a simulation game that allows you to travel around the world with various posture changes and sophisticated manipulations.

Enjoy fun challenges.

Features

  • You can enjoy the fun of levitating.
  • This game does not affect your real-world levitation skills.
  • You can enjoy the fun and beautiful game level.
  • This game provides an opportunity to consider gravity, the universe, and life.
